properties.title: Concierge OSGi - An optimized OSGi R3 implementation for mobile and embedded systems - Projects using Concierge
properties.author: Jan S. Rellermeyer

meta.name: description
meta.content: Concierge is an optimized OSGi R3 implementation with a minimal file and memory footprint, which makes it ideal for small and embedded devices.

section.name: Projects using Concierge

tr.td: Collaborative middleware for mobile devices based on OSGi
IKS Stream Processing System. (Current research project of Michael Duller, ETH Zurich.)

section.p: If you use Concierge in your project, please let us know and send an email.
